markdownRemark.html:
“Mendicants, it’s totally impossible for a mendicant who regards any condition as pleasurable to accept views that agree with the teaching. … It’s totally possible for a mendicant who regards all conditions as suffering to accept views that agree with the teaching. …”

AN.6.100. Anattasutta (“Not-Self”)
